destination_notes.Cuba: Comprehensive controls/embargo considerations; assume license required.
destination_notes.Iran: Comprehensive embargo administered by OFAC; BIS also has restrictions.
destination_notes.Syria: Comprehensive controls referenced under BIS Part 746.
destination_notes.North Korea: Severe restrictions; luxury goods & many items generally denied.

category_risk_rules.reason: UAV/defense-adjacent item: likely export-controlled; needs screening.
Encryption/telecom item: may require export classification and license review.
Dual-use chemical category: end-use/end-user screening recommended.
Hazardous materials: carrier + destination DG restrictions may apply.
Medical category: typically permissible but still needs destination screening.
